features: 【Package Includes】: 32 watercolor floral stationery paper size 7.5 x 10.4 inch and 16 self-sticking envelopes size 4.3 x 8.5 inch. 4 floral designs, double sided printing.

【Superior Quality】：Our stationary paper are made of quality material. Letter writing Paper and envelopes are compatible with inkjet or laser printers. Perfect for use with ballpoint, gel pens, fountain pen, pencil, etc.

【Perfect Pattern Design】：These stationary set is perfect for who loves to write handwritten letters. The letter writing paper with some decoration at corner and slightly color background makes calligraphy or writing clear but elegant and impressive.

【Multi-Purpose】：Printed on both sides with decorative watercolor designs, our letter writing paper is unique to create your Invitations, Anniversaries, Graduations, Announcements and your letter for family or friends.
【Easy to Use】: Each designed envelope and letter paper are individually packaged for easy differentiation and selection. Self-sticking envelopes for save time, easy to send.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have quite a few penpals and am always on the lookout for eye-catching stationery. This one doesn't disappoint. The paper is just the right weight for a feeling of richness and the colors are bright, clear, and beautiful. The papers arrived on time and in good condition.

reviews.reviewText: Súper lindas nos encantó la actividad y las hojas perfectas

reviews.reviewText: I like that there are various designs, decent quality paper & excellent price
